title.native: 好きになるその瞬間を。～告白実行委員会～
title.romaji: Suki ni Naru Sono Shunkan wo.: Kokuhaku Jikkou Iinkai
title.english: The Moment You Fall in Love

description: Second film starring characters from the HoneyWorks vocaloid group.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

title.native: ずっと前から好きでした。～告白実行委員会～
東京オータムセッション

node.description:
__[Website](http://uni-mafumafu.jp/) | [Blog (JP)](https://ameblo.jp/uni-mafumafu) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/uni_mafumafu) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOTR1tcOAhjgi6YukrPpZxg) | [Piapro](https://piapro.jp/uni_mafumafu)__

__Introduction:__
Mafumafu, alternatively known as Kagami Mite Shisshin-P, is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer, arranger, vocaloid producer, and audio engineer. He is better known as a utaite with a middle-high range voice.

__Biography:__
As a utaite he likes to add effects to his voice and scream loudly in his covers. He has a very wide vocal range and a versatile voice, having the ability to hit and leap into high notes effortlessly, sometimes to feminine range, without sounding strained or loosing the softness in his voice. However, he also sounds pleasant when he sings songs in his regular and lower voice, which can sound relaxing and quite soothing. On some of his covers, many people are often confused and argue about his gender when he utilizes his higher register, therefore making him a ryouserui. Because of his high vocal range, he is also capable of producing a very convincing female voice, most clearly seen in his cover of Matryoshka. He often makes use of his wide range in his covers by leaping into higher or lower octaves to match the tone of the song.

Occasionally he forgets some of the lyrics and either mumbles or makes cute noises until the next line. His songs are often tagged as someone with a "kakuseirui", also known as an energizing voice.

[Website](https://trysail.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/trysail_staff) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuI2in6tTAjsaqzdeOeWZkQ) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/trysail_official_goods/) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/3YmAt9U9INQwxAwfgMVfKD)

A seiyuu girl group belonging to Music Ray'n agency under Sony Music Japan. They also host A&G+ Radio "TriAngle Harmony" together.

__Members:__
• [Momo Asakura](https://anilist.co/staff/118479/Momo-Asakura)
• [Sora Amamiya](https://anilist.co/staff/116517/Sora-Amamiya)
• [Shiina Natsukawa](https://anilist.co/staff/118818/Shiina-Natsukawa)

__[Website](http://honeyworks.jp/) | [Blog (JP)](https://ameblo.jp/honeyworks828/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/HoneyWorks_828) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneyWorks56410) | [NicoNico](https://www.nicovideo.jp/user/59387)__ __Biography__ HoneyWorks, alternatively known as Haniwa, is a Japanese circle consisting mainly of the composers [Gom](https://anilist.co/staff/147280/Gom) and [shito](https://anilist.co/staff/147276/Shito), and the illustrator [Yamako](https://anilist.co/staff/119761/Yamako). The guitarist [Oji](https://anilist.co/staff/148135) (Kaizoku Ou), the illustrators Rocoru (in 2013) and [Mogelatte](https://anilist.co/staff/121589/Mogelatte), the video producer Ziro and the pianist [cake](https://anilist.co/staff/147555) (the latter three joining in May 2014) are also part of the group as support members. Later on they acquired the drummer Nakanishi in 2017. However, Rocoru graduated from the group in 2019. Some of their most popular songs include "Suki Kirai", "Hatsukoi no Ehon" and "Kokuhaku Yokou Renshuu". Their music style consists mostly of positive rocky songs. In January 2014 they had their first major debut, with the album "Zutto Maekara Suki Deshita.", which ranked in fourth place on Oricon. In May 2014, the start-up of "CHiCO with HoneyWorks" was announced. Sometime in early 2019, the circle began to include subunits: s×c, a duo comprised of shito and cake; and HoneyMonster, comprised of Gom (Kouto), cake, and Nakanishi. The circle also created a number of fictional idols, such as LIP×LIP and Dolce. In addition, ten light novels, based on the Confession Executive Committee Love Series songs "Kokuhaku Yokou Renshuu", "Yakimochi no Kotae", "Hatsukoi no Ehon", "Ima ni Suki Naru.", "Koi-Iro ni Sake", "Kinyoubi no Ohayou", "Heart no Shuchou", "Ijiwaru na Deai", "Boku ga Namae wo Yobu Hi", and "Daikirai na Hazu Datta." have been released so far. A short novella about the song "Watashi, Idol Sengen" was also included with a CHiCO with Honeyworks album. Light novels for HoneyWorks' other songs do exist as well; the Love and Hate Trilogy ("Nakimushi Kareshi", "Suki-Kirai", "Hajimari no Sayonara") and "Sekai wa Koi ni Ochiteiru" and its sequel "Koi no Chord" both received one.

__[Website](http://honeyworks.jp/) | [Blog (JP)](https://ameblo.jp/honeyworks828/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/HoneyWorks_828) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneyWorks56410) | [NicoNico](https://www.nicovideo.jp/user/59387)__ __Biography__ HoneyWorks, alternatively known as Haniwa, is a Japanese circle consisting mainly of the composers [Gom](https://anilist.co/staff/147280/Gom) and [shito](https://anilist.co/staff/147276/Shito), and the illustrator [Yamako](https://anilist.co/staff/119761/Yamako). The guitarist [Oji](https://anilist.co/staff/148135) (Kaizoku Ou), the illustrators Rocoru (in 2013) and [Mogelatte](https://anilist.co/staff/121589/Mogelatte), the video producer Ziro and the pianist [cake](https://anilist.co/staff/147555) (the latter three joining in May 2014) are also part of the group as support members. In May 2014, the start-up of "CHiCO with HoneyWorks" was announced. Sometime in early 2019, the circle began to include subunits: s×c, a duo comprised of shito and cake; and HoneyMonster, comprised of Gom (Kouto), cake, and Nakanishi. The circle also created a number of fictional idols, such as LIP×LIP and Dolce. In addition, ten light novels, based on the Confession Executive Committee Love Series songs "Kokuhaku Yokou Renshuu", "Yakimochi no Kotae", "Hatsukoi no Ehon", "Ima ni Suki Naru.", "Koi-Iro ni Sake", "Kinyoubi no Ohayou", "Heart no Shuchou", "Ijiwaru na Deai", "Boku ga Namae wo Yobu Hi", and "Daikirai na Hazu Datta." have been released so far. A short novella about the song "Watashi, Idol Sengen" was also included with a CHiCO with Honeyworks album. Light novels for HoneyWorks' other songs do exist as well; the Love and Hate Trilogy ("Nakimushi Kareshi", "Suki-Kirai", "Hajimari no Sayonara") and "Sekai wa Koi ni Ochiteiru" and its sequel "Koi no Chord" both received one.

__Twitter | Tumblr | YouTube | Niconico__ Introduction Sana is a Japanese utaite with a sweet, soft, and soothing voice. She is often described as an angelic loli. She is also able to sing in a more powerful but high, girly tone, which can be heard in her covers of "Lost One no Goukoku" and "Donut Hole". Biography Sana tends to sing girlier songs as they suit her cute voice better. She is most well-known for her covers of HoneyWorks songs, eventually leading her to release a collaboration album with HoneyWorks, where she covered 10 HoneyWorks songs. "Kokuhaku Yokou Renshuu" was her most viewed cover, with 467K views as of September 2014, and this is also the cover which brought her to fame. "Kokuhaku Rival Sengen" was her most viewed cover on YouTube, with 1.7M views as of May 2015. In May 2015, Sana made her debut with the stage name "sana." She sang the 33rd ending theme song for the anime, Naruto Shippuuden. On July 15, 2015, Sana released her third HoneyWorks album, "Suki ni Naru Shunkan wo." Five months later, on December 28 2015, she released a fourth album "(un)sentimental spica." Her latest album thus far, "Hush a by little girl," was released September 27 2017. Affiliations - Member of Flowery Girls - Member of Freesia with Kanzuki Ama, Sugiyama, Sanahara, *Nano and ari@ - Member of Utataneruko with Ikasan, Nayugorou, Ali and Oreo (Source(s): utaite | rateyourmusic | twitter (for avatar)

[Website](https://trysail.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/trysail_staff) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuI2in6tTAjsaqzdeOeWZkQ) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/trysail_official_goods/) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/3YmAt9U9INQwxAwfgMVfKD)

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/gotoujio)__

Junji Gotou is a Japanese animator and character designer, who mainly does animation direction and key animation.

__Height:__ 173 cm
__Hobbies:__ Karaoke, gaming
__Agency:__ Across Entertainment

[Profile](http://across-ent.com/talent/men/natsuki_hanae.html) | [Website](https://columbia.jp/hanaenatsuki/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/hanae0626) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3C3YOGFjn7Pq3lOCeUFHfg) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/hanae0626/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/hanae_natsuki0626/)

Won Best Rookie at the 9th Seiyuu Awards (2015) for his role as Inaho Kaizuka in _Aldnoah.Zero_. Won Best Lead Actor at the 14th Seiyuu Awards (2020) for his role as Tanjiro Kamado in _Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba_.

He is married, is a father of twin daughters, and has a cat named [Konpei](https://anilist.co/staff/269430/Konpei).

__Non-Anime Roles:__

- Protagonist - Metaphor: ReFantazio (VG)
- Ling Yang - Wuthering Waves (VG)

Twitter | Niconico | Instagram Introduction: shito is one of the composers of HoneyWorks, and he also contributes by playing the bass. He's responsible for the composition of most music in the Confession Executive Committee Love Series, while [Gom](https://anilist.co/staff/147280/Gom) usually helps him with the lyrics. (Source: vocaloid.fandom.com)

__[Blog (JP)](https://ameblo.jp/gom-blog/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/_gom_) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/gom_honeyworks/)__ Introduction: Gom is one of the earliest utaite, having started uploading covers in March 2007. He is well known for his hot-blooded singing style, putting great energy and passion into his covers, and often screaming loudly. Biography: His most popular cover is of "Okkusenman", which is also his first song covered. It has achieved over 12.49 million views as of the 10th of October 2019. Already in middle school, he wanted to be a "rockstar". On June 15, 2011, he made his major debut with Version Gom DX. Other than singing, he also writes songs, plays guitar, sings, does DTM (desktop music), mixes, and is active as a VOCALOID producer, under the name FernandoP (フェルナンドP), as part of the group "HoneyWorks". Affiliations - Member of HoneyWorks with ChorisP and Yamako - Member of HoneyMonster (Source: utaite.fandom.com)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/436797162)

Married to animator [Maki Fujii](https://anilist.co/staff/101081/).

Twitter | Niconico | Instagram Introduction: shito is one of the composers of HoneyWorks, and he also contributes by playing the bass. He's responsible for the composition of most music in the Confession Executive Committee Love Series, while [Gom](https://anilist.co/staff/147280/Gom) usually helps him with the lyrics. (Source: vocaloid.fandom.com)

She is a mangaka, animator, director, character designer, and an animation director. Some of her work has appeared in the adult manga magazine Lemon People.

After graduating from high school, she began working at Studio Beebo under the direction of Tomonori Kogawa, then moving on to Studio Io, Artland, AIC and other studios where she was an animator, designer, and animation director on many TV series and OVAs. She made her manga and character designer debut with Vampire Princess Miyu. Due to her magnificent artwork, she became very popular even outside the anime and manga scene, doing illustrations and character designs for many other projects.

Kakinouchi is married to anime director [Toshiki Hirano](https://anilist.co/staff/97477/Toshiki-Hirano).

(Source: AniDB)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mirumodake)

After graduating from an animation school she was working on many productions for Yumeta Company and Studio Deen.

Married to [Tetsuya Yanagisawa](https://anilist.co/staff/109785/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mirumodake)

After graduating from an animation school she was working on many productions for Yumeta Company and Studio Deen.

Married to [Tetsuya Yanagisawa](https://anilist.co/staff/109785/).
